scenarios.name: Late-Winter Demand Collapse
scenarios.description: A warmer-than-expected late-February/March weather pattern suppresses heating demand, driving NG spot prices sharply lower as storage withdrawals stall and inventory surplus builds.

scenarios.name: LNG Export Disruption & Supply Glut
scenarios.description: An unplanned outage at a major LNG export terminal redirects domestic natural gas supply back into the US grid, overwhelming near-term storage capacity and pressuring Henry Hub prices.

scenarios.name: Polar Vortex Resurgence Squeeze
scenarios.description: A sudden late-season polar vortex event drives an unexpected spike in heating demand, triggering a short-covering rally and sharp upside move in NG futures amid stale data feeds and delayed hedge adjustments.
